law.catch_line: ** CONTINGENCY - NOT IN EFFECT - CHAPTER 371 OF 2002 **...
law.text:
** CONTINGENCY - NOT IN EFFECT - CHAPTER 371 OF 2002 **
The State may not expend more than $250,000 in State general funds in each fiscal year to implement the Maryland Mental Health Crisis Response System.
The Administration shall implement the Crisis Response System, in collaboration with core service agencies, on a regional or jurisdictional basis as federal funding or funding from other sources becomes available.
